propertydef.name: MSTAR_BASE_LOCAL
propertydef.label: Local Base Directory
propertydef.description: Base directory on this computer. If blank, the default system specific area under mstarFiles is used.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_BASE_CENTRAL
propertydef.label: Central Base Directory
propertydef.description: Network drive path to the base directory on a shared server. If blank, the default system specific area under mstarFiles is used.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_CONFIG
propertydef.label: Configuration Directory
propertydef.description: Custom configuration settings are stored here.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_UPDATES
propertydef.label: Updates Directory
propertydef.description: Product packs, service packs and patches for the base installation are stored here.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_STANDBY
propertydef.label: Standby Directory
propertydef.description: If configured, a copy of all necessary application configuration and data files will be duplicated here to allow a standby application server to be started.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_ONBOARD
propertydef.label: Onboard Files Directory
propertydef.description: Onboard files are generated to machine specific subdirectories on this directory.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_DATA
propertydef.label: Data Exports Directory
propertydef.description: Databases are exported here as DMP files (so a large amount of space may be required) and then zipped.

propertydef.name: TempDBDirectory
propertydef.label: DataBase system temp Directory
propertydef.description: This is the temporary location where the database export is initially built. It should be a drive on the database server with the most free space.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_DATA_BACKUPS
propertydef.label: Data Backups Directory
propertydef.description: If configured, zipped exports are copied here as an additional precaution.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_VIMS
propertydef.label: Vims Files Directory
propertydef.description: Vims files are saved subdirectories on this directory.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_FLUID_IMPORT
propertydef.label: Fluid Analysis Files Directory
propertydef.description: Fluid Analysis files are saved subdirectories on this directory.

propertydef.name: SQL_SERVER_MDFPATH
propertydef.label: SQL Server File Path
propertydef.description: Sql Server primary file (mdf) is created on this path.

propertydef.name: SQL_SERVER_LOGPATH
propertydef.label: SQL Server Log File Path
propertydef.description: Sql Server log file (ldf) is created on this path.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_BO_JARS
propertydef.label: Business Objects Jars
propertydef.description: Location of Business Objects Java libraries.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_ADMIN
propertydef.label: Admin Files Directory
propertydef.description: Directory used by some housekeeping tools, e.g. snapshotSystem.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_OUTGOING
propertydef.label: Outgoing Directory
propertydef.description: Files to be transferred to support are placed here.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_SENT
propertydef.label: Sent Directory
propertydef.description: Files successfully transferred to support are moved here.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_HELP
propertydef.label: MineStar Help
propertydef.description: Directory to deploy the MineStar Help website to. In installations hosting multiple systems, sharing a directory across systems can reduce disk space.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_REPORTS
propertydef.label: MineStar Published Reports
propertydef.description: Directory to deploy the MineStar Published Reports website to. In some installations, this directory may be on a central file server hooked into a corporate portal, say.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_REPORT_TEMPLATES
propertydef.label: Templates
propertydef.description: Base directory for templates used to generate refresh properties.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_REPORT_PROPERTIES
propertydef.label: Properties
propertydef.description: Base directory holding refresh properties.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_REPORT_OUTPUT
propertydef.label: Output
propertydef.description: Base directory holding generated reports.

propertydef.name: MSTAR_DISK_VOLUMES
propertydef.label: Volumes to Monitor for Free Space
